module.name: requirement_decomposition
module.keywords: module, requirement, structure, decomposition, combinatorial, requirement dependencies, requirement relationship, constraint

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information needed to describe the structure of a requirement, including any explicit combinatorial relationship between requirements helping to compose a requirement, and any dependencies upon other requirements. Several predefined requirements are supported, including shape and non-shape based constraints. Several predefined relationships between requirements are supported.
